suite.name: Test Suite

kw.name: Initial Setup
kw.doc: Initial setup where the testbed file scan is done to check for any errors and to check if the setup satisfies the minimum requirements for the Usecase.

kw.name: TestBed Scan
kw.doc: Scans the testbed file for any syntax errors and also checks if the links and the ports description are defined correctly.

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

arguments.arg: Devices defined in links do not match with the devices specified.

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Fatal Error
kw.doc: Stops the whole test execution.

test.name: LLDP
test.doc: Configure LLDP Global and check if all the connected devices are detected and their details are populated.

test.doc: Display all the ARP entries and check if the entry is updated once any link goes DOWN.

test.status: Test execution stopped due to a fatal error.
